superadmin.label: General
value: They can view and accept the master service agreement
They can view the entity’s pricing schedule

superadmin.label: User management
value: They can view the user management screen
They can add users to the platform
They cannot add or assign a Super Admin through the platform
They can assign an Admin role
They can assign a Creator role
They can assign a Viewer role
They can prompt user actions or remove users

superadmin.label: Transaction approval rule
value: They can turn the approval rule (approval required toggle) on and off
They can give and revoke approval entitlement to themselves (Super Admin) and any other user on the platform
They can set a minimum number of approvers that are needed to approve each payment

superadmin.label: Accounts
value: They can view Corporate accounts
They can view Receivable accounts
They can view eCommerce accounts
They can create accounts
They can close an account
They can download reports (e.g. account statements, transaction confirmations)

superadmin.label: Payments, conversions & internal transfers:
value: They can create a payment
They can create a conversion (move funds between accounts to exchange currencies)
They can create an internal transfer (move funds between accounts of the same currency)
They can view payment activity
They can view conversion activity

superadmin.label: Exotic Foreign Exchange
value: They can view exotic foreign exchange activity
They can create an exotic foreign exchange order
They can approve pricing for an exotic foreign exchange order created

superadmin.label: eCommerce
value: They can view pay ins and pay outs
They can download reports

superadmin.label: Receivables
value: They can create a new payment link
They can view payment link history

superadmin.label: User-specific
value: They can view and accept user agreement
They can access and edit their profile settings

subLabel.label: If granted approver entitlement:
value: They can view the payments approval queue
They can approve or reject payments

subLabel.label: If not granted approver entitlement:
value: They can view the payments approval queue
They cannot approve or reject payments in the approval queue
